eventSummary:
A bank has issued a data breach alert to its customers after a hacker accessed sensitive personal information.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/25700184/Bank-Issues-Data-Breach-Alert-To-Customers-After-Hacker-Accesses-Sensitive-Personal-Information

Details regarding a UXLINK hack have been shared.
Sources:
- https://x.com/guardrailai/status/1970844469013692604

A new phishing attack is targeting open-source projects like Soldeer, utilizing fake GitHub accounts to create bogus projects and generate fraudulent issues. The emails appear to originate from a legitimate GitHub address but direct users to a deceptive site, github-fundation[.]com, to link their wallets. This puts numerous accounts at risk.
Sources:
- https://x.com/officer_cia/status/1969847
- https://t.me/officer_cia/3296
